attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: from april 2007 people living in Wales no longer have to pay for prescriptions while people living in England now have to pay £6.85 per item, this is an outrage why should people living in England have to pay and the Welsh not. It should be either free for everyone or everyone should pay this is not fair for people living in England

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
